import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Box, FormLabel, Typography, FormControlLabel, Checkbox, FormGroup } from '@mui/material' const categorie = ['Laptop', 'Desktop', "Phone"]; const type = ["ASUS", "LENOVO", "MAC OS"]; const RAM = ['16 GO', '12 GO', "8 GO"]; const PROCESSOR = [" Intel Core i7", "Intel Core i5", " Intel Core i3"]; const GRAPHICS = ['Graphique Intégrée', 'Nvidia GeForce', " AMD Radeon"]; const disque = ['1 To HDD ', '1 To SSD', "500 Go SSD", " 500 Go HDD"]; function SidebarFilter() { const [selectedValue, setSelectedValue] = useState(''); function handleChange(event) { setSelectedValue(event.target.value); } //checked={} onChange={} return ( Filter Computers: Categorie:



Types:




Type: ) } export default SidebarFilter
